website_summaries.verdict: It must be used exactly as intended, but if done so, it is by far the most effective back brace on the market.
pros: Relieves lower back pain and offers plenty of support
Is good for long or short periods of wear
Adjusts easily and is reasonably durable
cons: Some users claim installed magnets do not help with therapy
It can also be tough to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit and not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: This is made for a very tall person. It fits my waist but cuts into my shoulder blades & underarms and I can never wear this. I thought I had 30 days to return, but NO! I ordered on Nov. 22 and on Dec. 5 I am told that it is too late to return. Don't order this item if you think it may not fit since you will not be able to return it. I give it NO stars for this reason. Opps I must give it one star or I can't submit this. But it is really 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: This item is NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: I found this brace extremely uncomfortable and wanted to return it but when I tried to do this I learned that this "Item not eligible for return".......So I' m stuck with a $40 back brace that is no use to me. Had the product mentioned that this was the case I would not have purchased in the first place!! I am very disappointed to say the least!! One star rating is one star too much!!
customer_reviews.author: Bingo

customer_reviews.title: This item is a no return policy and the size it is not correct
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong size apparently I thought 40 inches would be plenty given at three for belt repair only notch and they have a no return policy I think it’s very sleazy
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Magnets are a Plus
customer_reviews.text: I like the magnets and the way the back brace fits. I had one of the side supports come out due to the seam not holding and tore. I sewed it and then the side came loose. I wish it would hold up better I only wore it twice till it came loose the first time then two times later the side seam is loose. The magnets help my back pain when I bowl just wish it was made better.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Need back support?  Look no further than the NMT Back Brace ~ Lumbar Support Belt!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a back brace for any number of reasons, give this brace a try. My back was in spasm to the point where it took me five minutes to straighten up. This brace supported my back and allowed it to relax at the same time. It's as comfortable a brace as I've encountered. Within 24 hours, I was starting to be able to straighten up without that excruciating pain. It gave me incredible support during a very rough bus ride to work and home. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad return policy
customer_reviews.text: The belt help my back and my back better after work. But after 60 days the stitch came lose. After showing pictures, the company want to pay shipping to return my bad belt. Then wait and see if I get anther belt. I feel I shouldn't have to pay for shipping. So I gave up and just give this review
customer_reviews.author: Marlon W.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and can be more fitted with the outer layered wrap. I don't really understand what the magnets do, but it seems to relax my twitching muscles near the spine where the pinched nerves are. I would recommend this to other people.
customer_reviews.author: luvmoose

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and expensive vs alternatives
customer_reviews.text: This brace came apart after 2 day of wearing. Less than 16 hours. The failure is with the cheap material and single stitching. I'm not sure if the magnets did anything, other than the added discomfort of wearing this brace. I have an Ace brand brace that I bought in a grocery store for $20. Much more comfortable. Better quality. !NO RETURN POLICY!
customer_reviews.author: Brett H.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think it'd work so quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I'd been having pains to the point that I was having a hard time sitting for too long. Doing my daily crunches and walking was painful. I started (and continue) to use the product for less than 1 week and I am pain free. I don't know, I have reservations when I read this type of review but my pain really is actually gone. I'm back to sitting, walking and doing crunches pain free in only a few short days. As I write this I feel like a paid sponsor/investor/prevaricator, I'm not.
customer_reviews.author: Tom DiMartino

customer_reviews.title: It's by far the best back support on the market
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it sits on me, I've tried other brands and whenever I'm wearing it they keep shifting so I have to keep adjusting them, not NMT,NMT stays in position now matter what kind of work I'm doing or how I'm moving, and the results are great
customer_reviews.author: Al Green

customer_reviews.title: Helps A lot!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for over a year and it really helps whe working around the house. I have lumbar stenosis and sciatica. Have tried others and this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Devin A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This item actually does work! After wearing this Support Belt for a couple of times I could feel relieve from lower back pain. The instructional video is awesome in helping to know how to properly use the belt. For the price I felt I had nothing to lose by trying it out - it has been a pain reliever, for SURE!
customer_reviews.author: Bad Eyes

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this back brace
customer_reviews.text: The NMT Back Brace was a god-send for me. I recently strained my low back badly and this back brace has allowed me to walk standing up straight with much less pain allowing the muscles to "calm down". It has also provided the support I need as I sit as my desk working at a computer for up to 7 hours per day.
customer_reviews.author: Beyond your wildest dreams...

customer_reviews.title: excellent lower back support
customer_reviews.text: I am an active 60 year old man. I have been struggling with spinal stenosis in my lower back for years causing issues when standing in one place for extended periods of time. I began using the NMT back brace and almost immediately felt some relief. It easy to wear under clothing and do normal activities. It encourages proper posture and provides comfortable support whether I'm working around the house, playing golf or working out! I'm anxious to see if my condition continues to improve the more I use it stay tuned ...................... Dave C
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: NMT Back Brace helped me finish a demanding trek in Nepal
customer_reviews.text: After trying several back braces for my aging back, I chose the NMT brace to help me trek in Nepal. The high altitude, very challenging mountainous trek was tough on my back, but the NMT brace kept me supported and enabled me to finish the 10 day trek. I couldn't have attempted the trek without my NMT back brace!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My husband has one of these and loves it. Since I have an unstable lower spine, he talked me into purchasing one for myself. This brace does indeed help keep my spine aligned both while seated at the computer and also while doing physical work. The extra tabs to tighten the belt help add extra support and strength. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Therapeutic value
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday and wore it to work last night. For the first time in 5 years I was pain free !! This back brace is worth every penny. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Magnet therapy works for me and boy do those magnets get hot
customer_reviews.text: Once again the magnet brace has helped. I originally started with the shoulder brace for a rotator cuff problem and it helped so much and made a believer out of me. When I was having some lower back problems I ordered the back brace. Within the first few hrs I could feel my bones moving around and settling back into place. We have an inversion table but it didn't help with my problem much. It took a couple of days and my back pain was fixed. Thanks NMT !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a fractured L1 vertebrae and this back support works wonders in helping me to feel better as I move around as well as when I’m relaxing in my lounge chair. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego retiree

customer_reviews.title: Instant pain relief from arthritis!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 78 yr old mother who suffers with arthritis in her back. She says this brace brings instant pain relief and allows her to stand, walk and tread without any pain. I hadn’t realized how miserable she was. Wish I had found this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: 0010girl

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It fits and the spinal stenosis pain is totally under control. I was hurting really bad and now I don't! Magic???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a bad lower back all my life. This belt gives me immediate support and comfort. The heating effect is very soothing. I wear it all the time. The service and response from the company have been very good and prompt. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Help for a Sore Back
customer_reviews.text: The NMT back brace provided some needed relief to my chronic sore back. I use it in the gym and on the tennis court. Great help.
customer_reviews.author: Ultimate Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stops pain in lower back
customer_reviews.text: After two days of wearing this back support brace my back pain is gone. This is incredible,I suffered so long with pain.
customer_reviews.author: whtmt5

customer_reviews.title: Close to you
customer_reviews.text: This back brace really helps me. I’ve had severe back issues for years and have had at least 2 spinal surgeries. A neuro spinal stimulator has also been implanted. My NMT back brace does allow me to be a little more functional. I do recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyPetLady

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday for work it is loosing the shape that come with but it is very good and can be adjusted very easily.
customer_reviews.author: ANA

customer_reviews.title: Fits Smaller Women
customer_reviews.text: Like the product in general. My wife is small and it fits her great and gives her the support she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Grid

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: Actually made me able to work, walk and stand for hours linger than without. There is definately a sensation if heat from the magnets, and I know that many A puncture Pris believe in the use of magnets, so makes sense to me. I would recommend this well designed brace.
customer_reviews.author: LenV12

customer_reviews.title: great back support
customer_reviews.text: pulled lower back muscle. Was hurting for a month. I got this and it felt much better. My dr. even said it was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: kevin leitz

customer_reviews.title: This is life changing for a 70 year old  woodworker
customer_reviews.text: The belt is easy to use and very comfortable. Lifting moderately heavy (20 - 40 lbs.) is no longer a cause to see the Physical Therapist.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I was please with the excellent customer service given by Tony Medina to help me ...
customer_reviews.text: Really made a difference in my back the moment I put it on!!! I was please with the excellent customer service given by Tony Medina to help me get the right fit !! I have used magnet therapy before and know that it does make a difference with arthritis. I would highly recommend this brace. It is very well engineered and will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Deb50

customer_reviews.title: The best back support brace I have found
customer_reviews.text: The best back support brace I have found, and I've been through many! Not sure whether the magnets and other imbedded materials help (with pretty advanced degenerative disc disease of all my lumbar discs), but the support provided by the belt is great. This brace is unusually wide, and unlike most others, doesn't have a tendency to slip upwards and away from the area of pain in my lower back.
customer_reviews.author: NGM

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It was also priced very reasonably
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this primarily because of the magnets. I have been a believer in magnets for at least 2 decades. They work. The back brace performed exactly as promised. I have recently been diagnosed with Psoriatic Arthritis so I have fairly severe lower back pain. But, there is no pain while I am wearing the back brace. I love it. It was also priced very reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my back and had bad sciatica pain
customer_reviews.text: I used this brace to help me walk upright and get relief from sciatica pain. It allowed me to work while giving my body time to get stronger. I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: My doctor didn’t want me to wear it for my condition.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Kirmani

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely satisfied with my use of the NMT Back Brace
customer_reviews.text: I have moderate scoliosis in my lower spine. I have experienced moderate to severe pain in my lumbar region for several years, particularly when I exercise. I purchased the NMT Back Brace approximately three weeks ago. I have used the brace each time I walk or ride my bicycle. I have been free of pain each time that I have used the brace while exercising, making my exercise much more enjoyable. I am extremely satisfied with my use of the NMT Back Brace.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Provides relief for my dad's arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 81 year old dad a few months ago. He has arthritis in his back and has a lot of pain as a result. He's been through multiple braces in the past that never provided much relief, so he asked me to find one for him. I bought this based on the feedback in the reviews and had it shipped to him. He LOVES it! It definitely helps provide the support he needs to alleviate some of the pain and discomfort he experiences. He's so happy with it that he asked me to order him an extra one, which I gladly did.
customer_reviews.author: SMW

customer_reviews.title: Back Brace by NMT
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the comfort & support that this brace provides for my lower back. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: pat guilfoyle

customer_reviews.title: Not Returnable!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not provide the support I want and now I cannot return it within 30 days. Kinda whish I knew that. I would not have bought it
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but maybe order a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice strong back brace. I purchased a size large, based upon the size guidelines, which I am well within. However, its a bit small and barely fits. I have a 31 inch waist.
customer_reviews.author: DeLoop

customer_reviews.title: Back Brace by NMT
customer_reviews.text: This back brace is working great for me. It is relieving pain, adding support to my lower back and is comfortable . I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Teapot

customer_reviews.title: good support
customer_reviews.text: I like the different sizes. dont know about the magnets or minerals but the brace adds support for my back
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: He was very pleased and has been wearing it for work everyday since
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brace for my son. His work requires extreme physical labor and his back was bothering him a lot. After the first day wearing the brace he reported that he had no back pain at all while wearing the brace. He was very pleased and has been wearing it for work everyday since. I am going to order one for myself and several more for family members. Great product that I would recommend to anyone with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Ear, Nose & Throat Medical Group

customer_reviews.title: True "Black Belt" Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for more than a month. It helps me to maintain my daily activities while suffering from lower back pain. I could even drive for 2000 miles on a long trip wearing this belt. I have also tried another brand belt but I really like the flexibility and the just right amount of heat and support of this one better. I have got a nickname "black belt" master from my sumi painting students. Isn't that cool? I just bought a second one as a spare belt.
customer_reviews.author: Henry X. Li

customer_reviews.title: great back brace
customer_reviews.text: Had a pulled muscle in my back and had a painful time sitting in meetings etc. With the back brace I had the stability of my back so was able to minimize my pain.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Smith Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Not sure if the magnets actually do anything
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Not sure if the magnets actually do anything, but the brace is quite adjustable to a comfortable fit. Does wonders to the back, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off, comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: This back brace has made walking my dogs on long exercises on hot days a God-send. It’s easy to put on and take off and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kittty Litman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the NMT back support/ HATE the fact that it keeps falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this back support for just 2 months now. When I started wearing it, I was so pleased with the support it gave my back. It was a purchase I would not regret. Then after the first few weeks or so, it started falling apart. A friend repaired it for me (I do not sew) and then it was all good again. But now it is falling apart in a completely different spot. I cant even wear it until I have it repaired AGAIN. The NMT back support is AWESOME!! I love that it has helped my back! Although it is very frustrating that it keeps falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Monica HARE

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: Great product I use it at work I am A nurse.
customer_reviews.author: lao

customer_reviews.title: Helps my back pain.
customer_reviews.text: The belt have certainly helped my back pain. My only question on the belt is how durable it is?? The ends of the two pull belts are curling up, making me question how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wev

customer_reviews.title: ... pain over a period of time but it is comfortable to wear and gives me good support
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this long enough to know how it will effect my back pain over a period of time but it is comfortable to wear and gives me good support. It appears to be well made. I would recommend it to a friend and would purchase it again. I have a 27" waist and purchased the medium size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pseudoscience nonsense. It's a $5 brace with false health information.
customer_reviews.text: This product is snake oil. The back of the package promises all sorts of nonsense such as "bio-energy activates the magnetic effect, releasing infrared negative ions". This sort of thing should not be supported in any market place and should be rejected as a scam. Other claims on the packaging are equal pseudoscientific woo.
customer_reviews.author: S. Migdal

customer_reviews.title: I really did not believe this product would give me ...
customer_reviews.text: I really did not believe this product would give me some relief from my Sciatica. But, it really does work! I have it on for about 6 to 8 hours a day. It helps me get through the day with less pain.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love IT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lower back brace. I have tried so many. It is made with high quality materials. I have used it for 2 weeks every day and the Velcro has not deteriorated like so many other back supports on the market and the ones I have tried before. It relieved my pain the very first time I used it. I highly recommend this NMT Lower Back Brace to anyone that has any back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D Wardell

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: I got this belt to help with lower back pain. Seems to be a decent belt with good velcro and durable design. It didnt really do anything for me and I still have same issues about 3-4 weeks after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaKid

customer_reviews.title: relief from pain
customer_reviews.text: This product eliminated my lower back pain and set me free to walk and do my daily activities without any pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elie

customer_reviews.title: Great support and help for a lower back injury!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a lower back injury! I could hardly stand up straight, but received this back brace and put it on and could stand up with little to no pain. Helped tremendously to aid in the healing process by keeping everything in place and supported.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs large
customer_reviews.text: this item is not eligible for return, and it runs large, so it doesn't work for me and I cant return it, so for me a total waste of money!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: djones

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't able to use it because it wouldn't fit right for my body. Would not recommend buying without being able to try it on first.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: God Sent
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 ruptured discs in my lower back and I have tried everything! Then I came upon this brace it is a God sent. I love this product so much that I just ordered another so I have backup. If you can't sleep and lye awake suffering in pain then this brace is the ticket!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jz 12345

customer_reviews.title: Great support and works very, very well.
customer_reviews.text: It saved my back! I highly recommend this. You'll NEVER regret it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: At first it seemed to help but after a month or so the pain returned and I noticed I didn't feel any difference between wearing and not wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: aRaineeDaze

customer_reviews.title: Does not relieve everyone’s back pain
customer_reviews.text: My back pain got worse using this. This one is very stretchy and perhaps does not support the back as much as my previous One did.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get tremendous back releif from this when I have to stand for any lenght of time...
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A little too wide for a woman
customer_reviews.text: I would get another one if it was not so wide, 71/2 inches high would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Moi

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit as size chart indicates
customer_reviews.text: Product was NOT as described. Ordered large based on size chart, having a 37 in waist. Brace that arrived was clearly labeled large, yet was 3-5 inches short in my view and after consultation with my chiropractor. Also, the description indicates a removable lumbar pad but nooner was included.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best brace!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great back brace! I just love it. A great help to my back issue I've had and I can't say enough great things about it!!! Keeps back warm,loose, and excellent support. Thanks again and keep up the great work with the product. Much appreciated!!
customer_reviews.author: T. A.

customer_reviews.title: runs large and NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: The item description suggested getting a large, but it turned out to be too big. Imagine my surprise when I found that the item is not returnable! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Lianna Jarecki

customer_reviews.title: No return policy!
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size. Runs a bit small. No return policy, so now I'm stuck with a useless back brace.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good product. If you are on the large side ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. If you are on the large side as I am, the brace rolls down in the front when sitting on occasion. Otherwise it's a great brace. Helps with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very supportive of a sore back and helps to make back feel much better
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good belt
customer_reviews.text: Excellent belt got relief from my lower back pain fast, highly recommend this belt
customer_reviews.author: walts

customer_reviews.title: well designed
customer_reviews.text: Fits well... seems well constructed. I am very happy with this purchase. Keep up the great work !
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Thate

customer_reviews.title: It is adjustable and easy to fit
customer_reviews.text: This just works. It is adjustable and easy to fit. And, it is comfortable to wear under my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: bjcroy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I feel better, what more can you say. It doesn’t work instantly. Be patient. I can wear it comfortably under my clothes. Even the nurses at the hospital were surprised. They had no idea I was wearing a back brace.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Walters

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I've found this brace, it really works for me! - it's easy to use and very comfortable to wear, it helps with my back and I also noticed, - as a bonus, it takes care of my post pregnancy belly (amazing! as I've tried so many other shaping wear that didn't work) and pms pain is gone for good too! now I'm getting one for my mom and one for my grand aunt too, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: newmom

customer_reviews.title: Can no go Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: The only back brace that I have owned that actually stays in place and can be adjusted to fit just about any body style. Give it a try...The price is good and it feels wonderful on a aching back. Dale
customer_reviews.author: Watchdogman

customer_reviews.title: Quality support, product is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brace. Awesome support and easily adjustable. The magnets inside are just an added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my husband and he really likes ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband and he really likes it. He has arthritis in his hips and it sure helps his back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Saladin

customer_reviews.title: some like ointments and pills give temporary relief
customer_reviews.text: This really works. Not necessarily over night but over time. I've had generally back soreness for several years and I've tried most remedies. some like ointments and pills give temporary relief. I wear the NMT several hours a day including when I walk. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: buddie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and was looking for to give me extra support and reduce the muscle strain in my lower back while still being comfortable. It’s also easy on and easy off 👍
customer_reviews.author: Russell Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Supports well
customer_reviews.text: Good support, not sure if magnets help but they can't hurt right? Have significant pain in L1-3 and this did help provide support
customer_reviews.author: Panzerman

customer_reviews.title: They should all be made like this.
customer_reviews.text: Best I've had over many decades. I'm buying another in case they discontinue it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs support to stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed to work well when it did, issue is when in use product doesn't stay in place. Tried to return the item within a week of receiving item but I was denied by Amazon given a generic statement of ineligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Phokham

customer_reviews.title: BACK BRACE
customer_reviews.text: This is one well made belt and it gets the job done. I do recommend this
customer_reviews.author: TN-Will

customer_reviews.title: Best ever back brace
customer_reviews.text: Best ever back brace. I was having to get 3 to 4 injections in my back, and now, I get 1 injection a year. I do wear my brace all the time, and I have already bought my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: NMT back brace
customer_reviews.text: This belt replaced a belt my hubby had and was so stretched out over the years. He wears it a lot when he's out doing work in the yard. He says it really helps his back and so when it was time to replace. We went for the same one he had prior.
customer_reviews.author: Doty Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: I like the support that it gave my lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McCall

customer_reviews.title: Back belt seems to work well. Used yesterday during sports activities and had less back pain. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Back belt seems to work well. Used yesterday during sports activities and had less back pain.
customer_reviews.author: FoundationTruth

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very comfortable. I bought it to have support when working around the house. I have walked in it and it is comfortable and feel good. I did not buy for the "magnetic therapy", but slept with for a "what the heck" I will try it. I slept great and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time.
customer_reviews.text: This brace does not belong on the top ten list.its very uncomfortable. It also rolls down a lot when moving.if your planning on laying in bed in one spot it would be meh.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Nicely

customer_reviews.title: Not For ME
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit properly. The inner straps were way to long (31" waist) and the adjusters were way too short. Put alot of pressure on the lower back, was in more pain using it than not wearing it. Found another brand that fit better. Sent an email and they basically said to watch their video and learn how to put it on right. They said satisfaction guaranteed. Guess not!!!
customer_reviews.author: XD9

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: I want to return this product because it is not as advertised. I thought I was getting a lumbar support, which this is not. this product is a total joke and I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: peter esperanza

customer_reviews.title: Good Wide Support
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good. It hurts on bare skin, and I have to wear it all day, so I use moisture wicking shirts under my clothes. By the end of the day (8-12 hrs) it hurts, but it has a broad area of support, and the support is evenly distributed. It's more supportive than the runner up, but I hope it lasts at least as long.
customer_reviews.author: J-Fix

customer_reviews.title: Great back aid!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect soft back brace. Magnets actually aid by wearing. Wear it with lifting and mopping floors.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it for driving in and long days in front of the computer
customer_reviews.author: J.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I SWEAR I BELIEVE THIS IS HEALING !!
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this a week and my back pain has already let up -- I have Chronic Pain too - I can tell a difference already. !! Hope it keeps it up !! Feeling Excited !!!
customer_reviews.author: Starla RH.

customer_reviews.title: My husband needs it to help him because of his ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband needs it to help him because of his constant back pain. He is overweight and this belt fits him and relieves some of the pressure on his back. Thanks for a belt that fits.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Cortez

customer_reviews.title: the NMT  back brace reduced my pain and improve my life
customer_reviews.text: I got the brace for the back support but it also helped me to get rid of my back pain, what was a pleasant surprise for me. Great product! Strongly recommend for everyone with the back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear and it seems to make a difference even after the first day. I am looking forward to the prolonged benefits of this. I am no spring chicken anymore and I need something to help with support as I am doing a lot of work that requires I have healthy back muscles, as well as everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.
